definitions.text: a defeat in which the losing person or team fails to score
wash consisting of lime and size in water; used for whitening walls and other surfaces
a specious or deceptive clearing that attempts to gloss over failings and defects
cover up a misdemeanor, fault, or error
examples: Let's not whitewash the crimes of Stalin
She tried to gloss over her mistakes

definitions.text: exonerate by means of a perfunctory investigation or through biased presentation of data
